lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I'm hopeful that by sharing some of my many blessings that people will come to view our country more positively.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange financial protection for businesses and am part of a financial services company that includes a bank

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: It seems to be a good way to fill a void, to help correct a serious structural problem...and also because it just seems like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of Latin American history and economics. I hope some day to live and work in Latin America in the realm of economic development.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I consult with people to develop online and offline business plans. My hobbies include cycling, swimming, scuba diving and business development.

lender.name: Graupman Engineering
lender.loan_because: we only started our engineering company a year ago and know how fortunate we are to already be successful. We want to pay it forward and help other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: We engineer sprinkler systems for mostly commercial buildings to ensure that as many people and assets can be saved as possible when there is a fire.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: My life and work are far less difficult than the people I lend to.

lender.name: Dave G.
lender.occupation: I own a website design company
lender.loan_because: U. S. Citizens need to share their blessings worldwide. It is a pleasure to deal with an organization that thinks our nation, and the world, should help globally one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a company that builds and services websites. I also have a real estate investment company. I have been blessed by God even when I wasn't being Godly.

lender.name: Roy,Sandy & Shadow
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege to be a part of the Kiva Community.
lender.occupational_info: Sandy books cruises for NCL.Roy is a retired Canadian Naval Officer and Real Estate Broker who now plays tennis.Shadow hangs out.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I believe microloans can change poverty into prosperity much more quickly than charity.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Shawnee State University where I'm earning degrees in Mathematical Physics and American History. I'm also employed by the Clark Planetarium, located at the university.

lender.name: Matthew & Rosita
lender.loan_because: We believe that With GOD ALL things are possible. We must all do whatever we can to make this world a better place.

lender.name: Elle Peji
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. It's about providing the fishing pole and not the fish.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to become more productive, fair, and respectful at work.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: As a strong advocate of the free enterprise system, I find that it's a good way to provide assistance to people who need help in getting started or expanding a business.
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired after 24 years as CEO and Counsel from an international engineering society.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: I'm bored and frequently spend money on random stuff
lender.occupational_info: I work on diesel engines onboard various types of marine vessels.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: everyone needs help sometimes

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupational_info: I would like to build an educational website that not only fun, but helps students do better in school.

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to help themselves and are not asking for handouts.
lender.occupational_info: Investment Counselor - I help people reach their own Financial Independence through investments and savings.

lender.name: John Michael Nikolai
lender.loan_because: I would love to have a profound affect upon the life of a complete and worthy stranger to whom I feel a kinship.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of photography and of life, attempting to preserve the unpreservable and immortalize the mortal. Whether it is the face of an aging young woman or the face of an eroding Irish cliffside, my images are the precious crumbs of my life experience. When I am just ashes in a County Clare breeze, I hope that my photographs will serve as a gentle reminder of the places I visited and the friendly faces I knew along the way.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I believe it's our turn to "Pay It Forward". Give a man a fish and he eats for the day, teach him how to fish and he eats for a lifetime-- Jesus
lender.occupational_info: I inform and assist companies with their telecommunications infrastructure using fiber optic technology.

lender.name: Chaplain Vaughan
lender.loan_because: God is Love
lender.occupational_info: I am married and have two children and three grandchildren. I enjoy fishing and time off to relax from work . I am a christian and want to show God's Love for all creation.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: every bit counts in business. If I can help empower someone to keep their dream alive then it was truly worth every penny!

lender.name: Kristen & Josh
lender.loan_because: We believe we are all connected and strongly wish to share what we can to help us all. We are all in this life together.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Because it is needed and I can do my small part to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an independent music distributor.

lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: It empowers people around the globe to have Life, Liberty and the persuit of happiness. What more could a human being need.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because:
I'm a writer and musician. One of my college dreams was to be a wealthy philanthropist. Before learning about Kiva, I didn't have much hope of reaching my philanthropic goal.
By teaming up with others through KIVA, I can help people make a big difference in their own lives. And now I AM a philanthropist!
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer. My favorite things to create are songs and song lyrics.

lender.name: Franco
lender.loan_because: Dont have enough capital to buy more items for retail and also to have a sufficient buffer stock when the demand is high
lender.occupational_info: My work revolves around servicing, repair and maintenance of motorcycles including setting up accessories and parts which is the trend in our city

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I want to help people all over the world who work hard and have a desire to make something of themselves and their enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in law school. I'd like to be work in corporate finance and counsel in 5 to 6 years time after I've completed my education. When I've earned and grown my own investments, I'd like to channel my money into health research especially foetal neurological conditions.

lender.name: Nicolas
lender.loan_because: it's everybody's responsibility to reach out to those in need.

lender.name: veasna
lender.loan_because: I need to improve my business, Because I sale electronicts product.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: The idea of helping out small businesses in other countries is baller to me.

lender.name: Ernest
lender.loan_because: A small financial sacrifice on my part opens enormous opportunities to the needy.
lender.occupational_info: I work with customers to help them find wireless communication solutions for monitoring and controlling remotely located equipment.

lender.name: Meg and Michael
lender.loan_because: we want to help!
lender.occupational_info: I work with folks in their 70's, 80's, and 90's, helping them reach their maximum potential and enjoy a high quality of life.

lender.name: Mitchell Family
lender.loan_because: Lending through KIVA ensures that every cent we loan makes it's way to the intended recipient.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others with a hand up as I have received from friends & family in my past....Like the movie Pay it Forward! It makes the heart feel good to do a small part in helping others in this BIG world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a payroll manager for a privately held infomercial company. In my off time, I raise alpaca as a side business.

lender.name: Harsh Pradhan
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that the way to truly change the world is through people helping people.A small donation can make a world of difference to people in need. In this country we are so fortunate. Its not asking a lot of anyone to give to those in need.

lender.name: June
lender.loan_because: I want to set up sari-sari store in our house to add more income for my family needs. And i want to save money for our basic needs because it is little bit expensive if you buy retail.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sub-distributor entrepreneur selling mineral water to our neighbors and earn 5 pesos per 25 gallons of water. I have a work experience in supermarkets so that it is easy for me to set up a sari-sari store."Tingi-tingi" is popular store here in the Philippines.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because:
Loan proceeds will go towards the cost of building a one-of-a-kind website I have purchased, (www.seattleISmusic.com). I want to create a new and convenient way for you to discover, experience and aquuire great music. It is going to be a new way for people to be able to discover and find music here in Seattle. A small portion of loan will be used towards marketing costs to help build a powerful new brand.
I have 7 years experience in the radio industry working within marketing/promotions for radio stations all over the US. I would like to take my experience and vision and make it a reality. I have founded my company on 2 personal qualities, PASSION and PERSEVERANCE. If you feel passionate about a particular business and have the fortitude to break down the barriers and redirect as needed, you can indeed do GREAT things!

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: all people need is an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Developing software to help manage trucking and shipping.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: We are a family of six and live off less than $40,000 a year. However we have a roof over our heads and food on the table, if I can help someone else have this I will. God is good.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young children from 6wks to 5 years. I am an a early education teacher.

lender.name: McKinsey Family
lender.loan_because: We would want a way to receive a loan if we needed it, and the Bible teaches us to love our neighbors like ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: The mother teaches people who are blind. The father maintains the home. The oldest son works in a factory. Two sons and two daughters are in school.

lender.name: Jon, Karlyn and Jack
lender.loan_because: It's super classy. Microloans>Microphones
lender.occupational_info: As a grain trader, I work with local grain farmers to market their crops. As students we talk during class and occasionally learn things.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: This is the most positive thing I can think of doing for our world economy. Instead of just feeding a black hole non-profit organization, I get to re-loan the same money over and over again to various people throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: Culinary cook for work, I also like to write.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: If I don't set the right example for my daughter, how will the world ever change
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full time Mom. It doesn't matter where on earth you live, if you have children, you know what I do with my day, my week, my life.

lender.name: CKoscielski
lender.loan_because: I want entrepreneurs all over the world have a fair chance to be successful.

lender.name: scott@joy
lender.loan_because:
Exodus 22:25 (New International Version) 25 "If you lend money to one of my people among you who is needy, do not be like a moneylender; charge him no interest.
Deuteronomy 23:19 Do not charge your brother interest, whether on money or food or anything else that may earn interest.
Leviticus 25:35-37 (New International Version) 35 " 'If one of your countrymen becomes poor and is unable to support himself among you, help him as you would an alien or a temporary resident, so he can continue to live among you. 36 Do not take interest of any kind [a] from him, but fear your God, so that your countryman may continue to live among you. 37 You must not lend him money at interest or sell him food at a profit.
lender.occupational_info: I help bring people into the presence of God through music.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: it feels good and life has been pretty good to me lately.

lender.name: Shirley&Bill
lender.loan_because: I've been there.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy capturing special moments for people, whether a newborn or a wedding, it doesn't matter. I believe every person has a story.

lender.name: Our 3rd Grade Class
lender.loan_because: We want to be the change I wish to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are Mr. Wallach's 3rd grade class in Tucson, Arizona. We are always looking for ways that we can have a positive impact on other people...especially those in need.

lender.name: Sophia Yi Scott
lender.loan_because: It can really make a difference. Also, reading Banker to the Poor by Muhammad Yunus was inspiring.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: I have seen poverty first hand and what a true difference a little help makes in the every day life of people in need.

lender.name: claudio
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone deserves an opportunity to better their life. This site provides a wonderful opportunity to connect those looking for that chance with others that are able to help.

lender.name: Reggie&Marigold >^..^<
lender.loan_because:
I've been to third world countries + Reggie, my dog, and Marigold, my shy cat & I have all we need.
CONNECT to an ENTREPRENEUR and be the LENDER you CHOOSE to be.

lender.name: Russel
lender.loan_because: Because it empowers people to do better for themselves and has a chain reaction on generations of people rather than just a short term solution.
lender.occupational_info: I do web design and development for a variety of businesses. Our professional web design company and search engine marketing firm seeks to educate other companies on how to develop and grow their businesses online while providing them the tools necessary to conduct their business.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to start my own automotive repair shop.
lender.occupational_info: I love to work, but i am unable to move forward because i have no funds.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with money and I think other people deserve it more than me.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm at Univeristy studying for a Film Degree

lender.name: Mark & Ieleke
lender.loan_because: Sustainable development of the private sector is the best way to help people out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the Bertelsmann Entrepreneurs Program with Bertelsmann AG, a German media company. I work on business development projects for their various business units in different countries.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupation: Stay at home mom/ Ebay sales

lender.name: Sadaf
lender.loan_because: I used to think alot as to how people all around the world can help others to stand up on their own feet and alleviate poverty, well kiva is the answer to my question.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives by giving them a chance...
lender.occupational_info: I am a co-owner of a business involved in the development and management of various agricultural crop farms.

lender.name: Prabhu
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need.

lender.name: Keri
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students to help them decide what careers to pursue, improve their job search skills, and connect with employers in their career field.

lender.name: Clarity Quest
lender.loan_because: We feel the best way to help people in developing nations is to aid them in becoming self sufficient. We are so lucky in this country to have easy access to capital in order to start a venture. We wanted to share our success with others!
lender.occupational_info: Clarity Quest provides marketing services such as internet marketing, web development and tradeshow management to technology companies throughout the world.

lender.name: Jeff Dick
lender.loan_because: $25 can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Manage daily operations of our management staff at our head office.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have been in that situation before and i know exactly what they are going through.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student at a University in North Carolina and i also have a full time security job, where i patrol, watch security cameras and handle emergencies.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: my main objective in life is to become a very successful CEO or President of a company, and these people are ones that want to succeed as hard as me.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a high school sophmore at a high school in Westchester County.

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: handyman
lender.occupational_info: its hard sometimes but boring

lender.name: Mohammad
lender.loan_because: I love helping hardworking people who are trying to improve their and other lives. I believe that good values are same across all groups of people and that we all love and care for each other.
lender.occupational_info: It keeps me occupied and is very interesting.

lender.name: annabelle
lender.loan_because: im into business retailing farm products such as feeds to animals,i need some capital because im planning to sell fertilizers to farmers.
lender.occupational_info: its a lot of fun, you can help farmers by giving them information about raising farm animals and brochure about farming.

lender.name: Sharath
lender.loan_because: It feels good!

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: everyone has a right to be happy. They should have every right and priviledge that I have and if I can help to make their lives better then I will do it.

lender.name: Danh
lender.loan_because: I loan because I'm in a position to-- everyone needs a helping hand every now and then. It doesn't take much...
lender.occupational_info: I am an architectural and graphic designer. I also teach design at the University of California.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I process employee payroll checks for work performed.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: This is great way to make our world a better place by giving hard working individuals the support they need in order to make their life and their family's lives more enriched.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe people have great potential, only lacking opportunity. The greatest of trees start with a small seed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a security specialist and consult businesses on security related issues.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I feel everybody should I have a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: One person actually can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do for sisters and brothers of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help make the workplace safer for the workers.

lender.name: Mary Kay
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: it's fun to help others

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life with a great career and family and I believe in helping others who want to make a difference through action, hard work and perseverance. Together we can make this world a better place by working towards a common goal.
lender.occupational_info: Unmanned Aerial System Tech

lender.name: Ginny
lender.loan_because: people need to lend a hand whenever they can
lender.occupational_info: I manage an Emergency Department in Michigan

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Marleen
lender.occupation: Virtual Assistant and Real Estate Investor
lender.loan_because: I can. The small that I can give to help improve the living conditions of someone and to also make their dreams a reality, to me it's priceless. If I could give more I would.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference! It would have made a massive difference if someone could have helped me when I first started!
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell products on ebay. It's fast paced and I get to work from home and stay here with the kids.

lender.name: Javier
lender.loan_because: I believe that this type of thinking and caring is what is needed in the world. When I saw the video feed of Kiva on Yahoo it was the first time in a long time that I felt hope for the future! Thanks Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are either sick or hurt and try to get them to the hospital for treatment by a doctor.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: This enables me to really make a difference.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: Helping others is addicting because I enjoy seeing others achieve great things. I hope my loans can give others opportunities they wouldn't otherwise have.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I can't take it with me. :) This money will make a difference in someone's life who truly needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit and manage IT clients within my organization. I work for a large insurance institution.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: This is a fantastic way to help other people!
lender.occupational_info: I care for sick people.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: it's helping someone....
lender.occupational_info: labor intense

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: People need the money & support to be successful. I like to see people who work hard get further ahead in life.
lender.occupational_info: I support the software my company develops. I am on the phone answering questions regarding our computer software.

lender.name: Jeff, Debbie & Family
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed and my family has been blessed with enough to share.
lender.occupational_info: My husband handles real estate transactions and I stay at home with the children and also work part-time selling items online.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Hopefully karma will catch up with me and it's nice helping people who will actually use the money for good.
lender.occupational_info: Drilling holes in the ground for oil and gas production

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: i want to start a small business so i can help in my family's expenses and have a stable business i can depend onto in the future

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I believe that all people deserve the chance to make a good life for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a project manager that deals mostly with the maintenance and rehabilitation of sewer collection pipes.

lender.name: Arturo
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with so much that it would be unthinkable not to share with those in need.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: Quite simply, it makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Mother and I am privileged to work in the world of contemporary art.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help others grow out of poverty like I did.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to. I loan because I have the ability to. I loan because I can

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: helping people to help themselves is the best way to I know to repair the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn English

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I give because I'm a follower of Christ and that's just what we love to do!

lender.name: wido

lender.name: Rachel & Justin

lender.occupational_info: Rachel stays at home to prepare to raise the baby. Justin works with a property management firm.

lender.name: Mahesh
lender.loan_because: I love to Help !

lender.name: ChattaL
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change in world.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: People helping people is what makes the world great.

lender.name: Darella
lender.loan_because: When I started my business, someone helped me.
lender.occupational_info: We are in the service of helping people who cannot afford lawyers with their legal matters.

lender.name: thu and natalie
lender.loan_because: My wife and I believe that the best way to help people is giving them an opportunity to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are passionate rock climbers.

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: The Love of God has blessed me to be a blessing to someone understand that God will use this to build His Kingdom.

lender.name: JEB
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who want to truly help themselves. And not give to people who use my money for other endeavores. I want to help people who want to pay me back, who are obligated to me for my help.
lender.occupational_info: I use optical theroy, and electronics knowledge to ensure that periscopes for the US Navy are in good working order. Its a comfortable government job. But I had to be good at what I do to get it.

lender.name: Geselle
lender.loan_because: hardworking people deserves to live better and be proud of what they have accomplish

lender.name: Kenny Luu
lender.loan_because: Its right in a world full of wrongs.
lender.occupational_info: Difficult yet rewarding. I have a dream and I'm chasing it. I hope to help others chase their dream as well.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I love following their business
lender.occupational_info: I am a business teacher

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: it is the least I can do for others.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries who dont have the opportunities or resources like other countries. I also have a compasion to help people whom need assistance and would like to give these hard working individuals an opportunity to better their lives... Thanks!
lender.occupational_info: I am an account executive at a top logistics company in US.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: Every Little Bit Helps :)
lender.occupational_info: Internet SEO/SEM Technologies

lender.name: Mike & Nancy
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone should have the opportunity to make their dreams come true. If we can help others make that dream a reality, we would be foolish not to try.

lender.name: Hiram and Michele
lender.loan_because: We want to help others to get businesses started and make better lives for their families.
lender.occupational_info: We own a printing business that distributes business forms.

lender.name: rosemary
lender.loan_because: I cam from a south american backgoutnd frommy mother's side. She became a widow when I was very young and growing up I saw how she struggled to give me all things thru out life..I know what it is like to struggle.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a brokerage firm in the stock market industry.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to have the ability to support their family.
lender.occupational_info: I repair electronic equipment in the communications industry.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I don't have much money, but a wonderful life, and it feels good to help others less fortunate make their dreams and goals in life come true :-)
lender.occupational_info: I work part-time for a women-owned commercial construction company who installs windows and doors for large projects such as schools or condominiums. I make sure things are taken care of in the office, and help make sure things run smoothly and efficiently. I am also a full-time student, and mom to 3 beautiful children, ages 11, 5 and 3.

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: it is a way for me to help others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I spend alot of my time on the job seeing the bad side of people and it's nice to encourage change for the good.

lender.name: tknight
lender.loan_because: It is my way of helping to teach people to fish....
lender.occupational_info: I help commuters, employers and governments move people back and forth to work as cost efficiently as possible. Even when that means not making the trip in the first place. Another way of teaching people to fish...

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: helping others is more important to me than helping myself
lender.occupational_info: very stressful! i answer a lot of questions and deal with a lot of companies as well as conform parts for aircraft

lender.name: Godan
lender.occupation: Retired - was engineering manager for a food compa

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity for me to help others. Do unto others as you would be done by you.
lender.occupational_info: I take large amounts of data and turn it into useful information.

lender.name: Jacyn
lender.loan_because: nothing beats a smile on a stranger's face (:
lender.occupational_info: I'm a media student.

lender.name: gale
lender.loan_because: Teach a person to fish is so much better than giving the fish.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: It is important to give back whenever you can, especially to people who have shown the determination to make a better life for themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I am owner of a mobile x-ray company.

lender.name: Alan & Abby
lender.loan_because: We want to do something to make the world a better place for everyone.

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: What better use of $25 can a person come up with??? I love the spirit in which these loans are given: person to person, nearly face to face. It doesn't get any better than that for me.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a high school French teacher for 12 years.

lender.name: Sooey
lender.loan_because: I'm a broke college student but I still try to do what I can because I believe that there are strength in numbers, $25.00 may not be a lot but every little bit helps. Everyone deserves a chance to live a better life and I am more than willing to pitch in whatever I can to help those people achieve it.
lender.occupational_info:
College student majoring in Economics.
Graduated...now working at AAA.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I cut hair, and style hair. I also paint nails. I believe I am quite good at it.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help. The amount of money is small for me, but it will make a world of difference for these people.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: Help those who wish to feed themselves and not ask for free handouts.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Accounting

lender.name: Dior
lender.loan_because: i want to start my own cleaning service business so I can provide a better future for my daughter, family and myself.
lender.occupational_info: I work monday - Friday talk to customers every day I love dealing with customers I just want to own my business

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I can. In my blessed life, I unfortunately do so little for people less fortunate than me. This is a small way I can give to others.

lender.name: Ryan and Christina
lender.occupation: Owners of Exodus Commercial Construction, Inc.

lender.name: The Toon Family
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps
lender.occupational_info: I make various computer hardware and software systems work together

lender.name: Liz and Barry
lender.loan_because: We want to share God's abundance so we all can ALL benefit from it.

lender.name: Lynnette
lender.loan_because: We are here to help each other. If someone is in need, then we need to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help and to realize that we all need different kinds of help from each other every day.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my 2 boys and keep them out of trouble. My husband is an accountant - a person who helps companies manage their money. He lived in Lima, Peru when he was a teenager.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful opportunity to help someone in our global community improve their lives...I feel as though I'm helping a friend or a neighbour, except that neighbour (or friend) might be half a world away!!

lender.name: Norm, Tracy & Hunter
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of why this site was started and it just plain feels good to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I review applications for insurance acceptability on homes, farms and small businesses.

lender.name: Peg
lender.loan_because: I feel that I am very lucky to live in the USA and would like to help others less fortunate.

lender.name: Aaron and Amanda
lender.loan_because: This is such a great way to reach out to other parts of the world and lend a helping hand where it is needed!!
lender.occupational_info: Aaron works in the oil fields repairing broken parts of various machines! I (Amanda) work out of the home raising our 2 little girls and keeping the house in order!

lender.name: Mandie
lender.loan_because: Although I feel that I do not have much, I have more than others requesting loans on Kiva. My heart goes out to those trying to better themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I am the typical American. I sit in an office all day, away from the hot sun or pouring rain, and complain, saying I would rather be doing something else. I understand that I have it easier than most people and if I can help you make your life or work easier in any way, I will do just that.

lender.name: Shane & Cathy
lender.loan_because: We loan because people need help.
lender.occupational_info: Shane works for a company that makes building supplies. Cathy works in commercial loan banking.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to do something great.

lender.name: David & Jen
lender.loan_because: This gives a great chance to help.. Many people just sit on there hands and wait for someone to give them something..Kiva gives people a chance to help and gives an oppurtunity to those who want it..

lender.name: Venkateswara
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help someone have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: After Long Time I Have a time to Lend some money who need come up from their struggle.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to do, what I'm supposed to do.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I am glad to help people who are working to better themselves.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: Give others hope!
lender.occupational_info: Not very sexy but it pays the bills!

lender.name: Frankie
lender.occupational_info: I work with people all the time and I like it I can walk up to anyone and talk with them like I have known them my whole life.

lender.name: Kyung
lender.loan_because: When I was young there was a great storm, and thousands of starfish were washed up on the beach. The next morning I walked along the beach and I saw a little girl running up and down the beach, frantically throwing the starfish back into the water. I asked her what she was doing and she replied "If I don't throw these starfish back into the water the sun will burn & dry them out and they will die. I responded: "What's the use? You'll never be able to save them all. It won't make any difference." She held up a starfish and said: "it makes a difference to this one."

lender.name: Tania
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful concept & it feels great to be able to help.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to give back.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Because a small effort on my part can have a huge positive impact on someone else's life and I would want someone to do the same for me.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of people that build and repair computers for a company. My team also helps the company employees with any computer problems they have.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I love to help people, especially people trying to start something. I'm an entrepreneur myself, so I know the value of getting some help to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I create logos, design brochures, directories, web sites as well as doing commercial real estate.

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupation: I do a Little of Everything

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: $25.00 to me is just a drop in the bucket, but to someone else it could make the difference between making a living or not.
lender.occupational_info: I am an environmental geologist. I try to protect the public from environmental hazards left behind by large corporations. Sometimes the hazards involve contamination in the soil and groundwater and I have to figure out how to clean up the soil and groundwater so that they are safe for people to drink, touch, eat or breath.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a little help to get on their way. I like helping others; it's the right thing to do. Love is a value of heaven, and to show it here on earth is to experience a little of what heaven is like.
lender.occupational_info: I am an American English teacher who lives and works in Seoul, South Korea.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: Sometimes doing something great takes a little help from others. I've been blessed and am thankful to be able to help someone else so easily.
lender.occupational_info: Trish is a Police Officer, helping to make their community a little safer.

lender.name: Ginny
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me abundantly and so I want to help others.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I can afford to and I like to help when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I drive people in a limousine(stretch luxury car) around the city.

lender.loan_because: I care about our fellow beings.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to better their lives.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help someone in need.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.occupation: ASF CONTRACTING INC. / REAL ESTATE AGENT
lender.loan_because: I KNOW WHAT IT IS LIKE TO BE IN NEED AND WISH SOMEONE WAS THEIR TO HELP, IT IS GREAT FEELING TO BE ABLE TO HELP THOSE IN NEED!!
lender.occupational_info:
ASF CONTRACTING INC. is proud to offer a wide range of real estate development services. Our team of experts has a wide range of experience and can tailor our services to meet your exact needs.
ASF CONTRACTING INC. IS A FULL SERVICE, LICENCED AND INSURED BUILDING CORP. SERVICING NASSAU, SUFFOLK, AND 5 BOROS. SPECIALIZING IN:
- DEMOLITION: RESIDENTIAL & COMMERCIAL PROPERTIES
- EXCAVATION AND FOUNDATIONS
- DRYWELLS SUPPLIED AND INSTALLED
- LAND CLEARING AND GRADING / DRAINAGE / FULL SITE ASSESSMENT SITE PREPARATION
- PROPERTY MGMT.
- ALL PHASES OF CONCRETE WORK
- ALL PHASES OF MASONRY WORK INCLUDING
- INTERLOCKING PAVERS / CULTURED STONE / BRICK AND BLOCK WORK CELLAR ENTRANCES / DRIVEWAYS / SIDEWALKS / WALKWAYS / STOOPS AND PATIOS / VIOLATIONS REMOVED
- 10-30YD CONTAINER SERVICE / MACHINE HIRE
- MATERIALS DELIVERED / RCA / TOPSOIL / SAND / ALL TYPES OF STONE AND GRAVEL
- GENERAL CONSTRUCTION / REMODELING / EXTENSIONS / DORMERS
- NEW HOMES / CUSTOM HOMES
- REAL ESTATE DEVELOPMENT / REAL ESTATE SERVICES AND SALES
- EXPEDITING SERVICES

lender.loan_because: I want to help people change their lives for the better. Everyone needs a start.

lender.name: Kat, Kin & Kai

lender.occupational_info: I am who some would say is the "mean guy", but it is a job, and someone has to do it. :}

lender.loan_because: We should help out each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers.

lender.name: Anna

lender.name: Lauryl
lender.loan_because: I beleive in the philsophy of doing what you can, where you are, with what you have. Every little bit helps and if everyone that can puts in just a little bit the world will be a better place for us all.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a house to call their home.

lender.loan_because: God gives us many blessings and they need to be shared with others in need. It is a joy to share my blessings.

lender.loan_because: I loan because I care...

lender.name: Ryan Provost, Inc.
lender.loan_because: As a small business, we recognize the risks and financial needs associated with opening and maintaining a small business. Our goal is to foster that entrepreneurial spirit in order to grow a new business that will benefit the local community. Since finding Kiva.org, we have committed to originating a new micro-loan for each contract we complete.
lender.occupational_info: We provide website and design services that enable our customers to better leverage their overall brand.

lender.loan_because: I believe people need to help each other in meaningful ways with a hand up, not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: Besides making and sharing music, I translate from one language into another, helping communication.

lender.name: Rey Andrew

lender.occupational_info: I am a Geo-Structural Civil Engineer. I play an important role in designing structures which include but not limited to buildings, roads and highways, bridges etc..

lender.occupational_info: I find disabled people jobs and give them support to help them be sucessful in those jobs. I like to think that I am in the business of changing people's lives for the better.

lender.name: Lisha
lender.loan_because: I care about people and want to help them as much as I possibly can; Kiva allows me to reach out to many people that otherwise I might not be able to reach. Additionally, I help adults write resums, study for their GED, and study for their U.S. Citizenship test. I am truly blessed.

lender.loan_because: I believe that it helps people build themselves a better future. I want to support that.

lender.loan_because: i want to put up a business in my place ,internet cafe is a good business in my place which no internet cafe for now ,and im in a place near the market ,which most people going there . everytime im going to chat to my friends or do things on the internet i need to travel 4 kilometers just to see internet cafe or go as far as 14 kilometers to see a good internet cafe .
lender.occupational_info: i have a 2 sows in my backyard and its making money good for my simple life for now .......not really easy to have sow ,you need to let them care as like your kids ,eat them good ,proper vitamins ,love them so that they will give you more babies too ........its fun but i cant make it as big as my plan cos i dont have good place for a pigerry . but if they will give me a chance i want to open a business for internet cafe in my place ,its gonna be a good money in there .........i have 2 computers already but still need a little more to complte my business plan ,i do have a location already i just need capital ..........

lender.occupational_info: I love to bring back the lost beauty on things that were once perfect.

lender.name: Candice

lender.loan_because: with opportunity comes responsibility. We have had many opportunities and privileges in life. It is our responsibility to do what we can to cultivate opportunities for others.

lender.loan_because: Please respond to my emails whenever you can.

lender.occupational_info: i contract to work at hospitals across the United States to help fill in the nursing shortages.

lender.name: William

lender.occupational_info: "Be the change you wish to see in the world" ~Ghandi

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have what I have, and I'd rather pass that fortune along than buy $150 Porsche pencils.

lender.name: Warlen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people whose needs are modest and who appreciate the loan.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that computers run well and that the data on them is protected..

lender.name: Daniele
lender.loan_because: I'm paying it forward.

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: Growing up in an immigrant family I would like to help others as many have help my family and myself
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Resource Specialist Teacher at Alain Leroy Locke Charter High School in Los Angeles, CA.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I've been there. I know what a helping hand can do to change a person's life and outlook on humanitarian love.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Compliance Management department at a local PUD. I make sure our agency meets state and federal deadlines.

lender.name: CWP
lender.loan_because: In the US I'm considered poor but not too poor to make small loans to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Before the economy tanked I sold a few items on the Internet that I bought and that others asked me to sell for them.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: It is an awesome way to create social change with a small step and see the impact you are making.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hotel mainly at the front desk checking guests in/out, and am training to be a manager.

lender.name: vincent
lender.loan_because: I want to serve people by renting them computer like internet cafe in a consumers price that will be convinience to them.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Technician is a great challanged and change my way of life, like being patience and understanding in every trouble that i face both computer hardware and software problems.

lender.name: Sivanesan
lender.loan_because: i believe in the human spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in the localization industry...communicating the worlds languages :)

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Changing the world for the better isn't as hard as it seems.
lender.occupational_info: I help organize a performing arts festival (theater, dance, comedy, that sort of thing) in Minneapolis.

lender.name: Kasey
lender.loan_because: only we can change the world

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: I think helping people is the only way we can balance the equation
lender.occupational_info: I teach financial statement analysis and project evaluation at a college level and I am an independent consultant

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: it feels great to make a difference in someones life. It's mentally and emotionally rewarding.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in many ways. God has given me many opportunities to be successful. Its important to give back when one can.
lender.occupational_info: I help families and kids with emotional and/or mental issues. It is what I am good at and what I enjoy.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because:
For the needy shall not always be forgotten: the expectation of the poor shall not perish for ever. - Psalm 9:18
Blessed is he that considereth the poor: the LORD will deliver him in time of trouble. Psalm 41:1

lender.name: Absloute Signs&Graphics
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner also in need, lending via Kiva is an extra opportunity to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make signs and graphic displays to help businesses advertise and promote their products & services

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Ameer Kian
lender.loan_because: I can afford to help others help themselves.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I can help change the lives of others with a little contribution.
lender.occupational_info: Helps the research development of new drugs.

lender.name: Anna and Chris
lender.loan_because: We are nosey and like to learn about how people around the world are making their livings and enjoy being able to help out when we can.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me over the years and I like helping others as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur who incorporated in 2005. I consult with businesses (shipping, transportation, broadcast communications, sales, leadership, management, customer service), I have my own online travel agency, I am a part-time actor and voiceover specialist and I retail goods online as well.

lender.name: Chris & Myrona
lender.loan_because: We are very blessed and wish to provide opportunities for others to enrich their lives.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: It is food for the soul. I hope my contribution helps make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: It can be stressful because it involves sales, but no less a very comfortable occupation.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I know that giving a hand up will make a bigger difference than a hand out.

lender.name: JBnyc
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Creative film and comedy production.

lender.name: Ari
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than myself so that we can both be fortunate together...
lender.occupational_info: I help people use their computers...

lender.name: Evgeny
lender.loan_because: finally realized what's good and really valuable in life.
lender.occupational_info: developing websites and doing business on internet

lender.name: Paul & Robyn
lender.loan_because: we have a passion for traveling around the world and enjoy giving back to the local communities that give so much to us.
lender.occupational_info: We work in hotels and enjoy serving people

lender.name: Elijah from Philippines
lender.loan_because: I need a capital to put up a computer repair shop. I would also wanted to include other computer hardware peripherals in it to attract more potential customers.
lender.occupational_info: I repair hardware and software systems of desktops, laptops and other peripherals devices.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that even small amounts of money, from many people, can help to improve life, prospects and communities of so many places.
lender.occupational_info: Repair and remodel buildings.

lender.name: Rain
lender.loan_because: We are so incredibly blessed. I want to share that blessing.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.occupation: Owner of a greeting card business

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I was taught (and still believe) it is better to give than to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I find ways to make health care affordable to people.

lender.name: ravi
lender.occupational_info: Our company help small and medium enterprises in sri lanka and worldwide to use ICT as a tool to develope their companies by automation of their buisness via quality software and market their product & services through interactive web solutions at very competitive prices.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It makes me happier knowing I'm doing something right for someone who needs it.

lender.name: In memory of mom Suree
lender.loan_because: My mother would have wanted it this way.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I feel great about helping others- knowing their stories makes me feel I know them just a little.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Licensed Clinical Social Worker in Los Angeles - I have been a Social Worker in Medical Centers and have also worked on my own as a therapist.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I loan because it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: My job pays my bills and sometimes I have alittle extra and that is why I'm here.

lender.name: Pejman
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: it helps to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: It's great to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and arrange rentals of facilities in a school district.

lender.name: A Massage with A Mission
lender.loan_because: We are highly motivated to make an effective & sustainable difference in people's lives. We were immediately drawn into the fascinating world of microcredit after a Google search on July 13th (2007) "how to change the world"-- since then, we've been busy reading: A Billion Bootstraps, The Price of a Dream, Banker to the Poor, etc....exciting stuff!
lender.occupational_info: A Massage with A Mission Studio & The Mobile Massage Co. has as it's mission: "Alleviate Stress. Abolish Poverty. (ASAP)" We are designed to accomplish this mission by increasing personal wellness through massage therapy and nutritional supplements- and by giving loans through Kiva and gifts through Heifer, with the money that comes through our Social Enterprise. It's a serious business that is a whole lot of fun!

lender.name: Cord
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner, and understand the value of someone investing their time and money in my dreams and aspirations.
lender.occupational_info: I help people design their projects to reduce impacts on the human and natural environment.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to reach out and help others, to be able to watch businesses grow and how just a little help can go a long way.

lender.name: Alttaf
lender.loan_because: I want to improve my business as i got so big loss last year due to rain flood in gujarat, india. I hope to earn with that loan money and pay back as soon as possible. Honestly!
lender.occupational_info: I am doing software marketing and my field of interest is marketing, i can do marketing and im best in it!

lender.name: Sy-Chuong
lender.loan_because: that is the least I can do to help someone to improve their lives. I can't help much but together with other Kiva Lenders, we can make a big different.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mechanical technician with a computer background.

lender.name: sonia
lender.loan_because: i want to have my own carinderia......in this way i cn support my family......
lender.occupational_info: my work is fun and easy...... have lots of parokyano...they said they love my food....cause its very affordale and yummy!!!!

lender.name: Kevin Hall
lender.loan_because: I was inspired
lender.occupational_info: I find jobs for engineers

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I have a very good life and I would like to share some of my good fortune with others. I learned about Kiva when my sister, Kris, who sponsors five people, gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my birthday.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office that looks like a living room. People come to talk to me about whatever is troubling them and, together, we work to find a way to make their lives better.

lender.name: Mr J
lender.loan_because: It helps people that need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I am very fortunate to be blessed with all the things I need. Health and Happiness.

lender.name: Ramzi
lender.loan_because: Micro loans grabbed my attention long ago as a way to help people help themselves. Now I can participate.
lender.occupational_info: Environmental Consultant

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all a person needs is a little bit of assistance to get on their feet or take off with a business. It is truly an honor to be able to help combat global poverty having grown up in poverty myself.

lender.name: Phearoth (PB)
lender.loan_because: Be helpful whenever possible...It is always possible.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupational_info: I teach chemistry to high school students.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: it is a great concept, to help others in need. truly an awesome idea.
lender.occupational_info: i am a sales rep. for wonder bread/hostess cake. i sell and i deliver our products to stores and schools. its great to see the kids enjoy our products.

lender.name: austin
lender.loan_because: God loves you

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to make a personal impact on someone else's life. I want to give people who don't have the same opportunities I have here in America. Give them a chance to improve their lives. As they make a better life for themselves, they pass on that success to their family and communities. This will make for a better world, hopefully one with compassion and empathy for those that are living in less fortunate circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a waitress who works in a delicious asian cuisine restaurant.

lender.name: graham
lender.loan_because: It is such a fair way of distributing wealth and giving people a hand

lender.name: Francisco Jr.
lender.loan_because: I want to uplift our current status where my existing outdoor shop is not in the right place where consumers usually go. I want to transfer in new location where i can sell my goods to the public as well as to get more brands to sell.
lender.occupational_info: I retail good quality outdoor goods which are proudly philippine-made and my shop is not in the right position. I need help so i can provide well for my family.

lender.name: ECON 201
lender.loan_because: Jacksonville University economics students are dedicated to helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Economic growth is achieved by increasing productivity through investment in capital. This can be physical capital, human capital or technology. Physical capital is anything man-made that makes workers more productive, such as vehicles and machinery. Most micro loans help people to obtain physical capital. Human capital is education. Some micro loans help workers become more productive by furthering their education. Technology is the knowledge of methods of production. Research & development is a common means of discovering and developing new technologies. Micro loans help the world to achieve more economic growth, which in turn improves the standard of living and reduces global poverty.

lender.name: Guru
lender.loan_because: Everyone can use a little help. If I can help by making small contribution, why not.
lender.occupational_info: Work for an Airline and Package Delivery Company

lender.name: Carolie
lender.loan_because: I believe in "love one another."
lender.occupational_info: Graphic designer, storyteller, writer

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed enough to have a good education and earn a decent living. Everyone deserves a chance to live.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I have had the opportunity to travel to several impoverished areas in the world and I realize how wonderful it is for me to live in the US with so many resources and the opportunity to have finances to work with. I love being able to help bring hope and vision to others that have a desire to make a difference in their life but might not have what they need to make these changes.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit, screen, and train individuals to speak in the US about hurting, needy people in other countries.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I would like to have a small business to earn an extra income to support my family

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with a loving husband, a wonderful son, and a good home. We've had our share of financial struggles so I know how it feels to not know where your next meal is coming from. I firmly believe that God will provide and sites like this are a way of letting that happen. I loan because everyone deserves a shot at a better life. I hope that I can help someone see that they aren't lost in the world, we know of your struggles, we see you, and we care about you.
lender.occupational_info: I work from home part time on the computer...but I'm a mom before all else!

lender.name: KENNETH DEVON HAWKINS
lender.loan_because: I UNDERSTAND THE TROUBLES OF BEING UNABLE TO GATHER FINANCIAL MEANS IN TIMES OF NEED.
lender.occupational_info: I WRITE NOVELS FOR THE BEAUTIFUL MINDS.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I make good money and I feel I should help others if I can
lender.occupational_info: I work in the oil field. I work very very hard for every dollar I earn. I am out in the weather no matter what it's like doing my job. I can appreciate those who want a loan that they intend to payback instead of a handout.

lender.name: Vid
lender.loan_because: I really want to help people in need and make a difference to somebody's life in a positive way and I found Kiva the right platform

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I understand how difficult it is for others to start/run a business.
lender.occupational_info: I currently operate a online company selling home security & automation products.
